/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A river runs parallel to the street, adding a serene element to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
